column5: [f7]<$75>よせ！俺、おまえと戦いたくないよ！
column6: [f7]<$75>Stop! I don't want to fight you!
Let's do this!

column5:
どうってことねえな\n
いつでも相手になってやるぜ\n
待ってるぜ
column6:
That was easy.\n
I'll fight you anytime you want.

column5:
うへぇまいったまいった\n
俺の師匠は塚原ト伝様だ\n
おまえもならうといいぜ
column6:
Whew! I give up!\n
My master is Tsukahara Bokuden.\n
You should ask him to teach you, too.

column5:
さきに行って話しといてやる\n
気むずかし屋だがいい先生だ\n
じゃあな・・・
column6:
I'll tell him about you.\n
He's hard to please, but he's a great teacher. Well, see ya.

column5:
ほほうガマ仙人の育てていたガキかい！\n
どんだけ強くなったか見てやろうぞい！
column6: Ah, you must be that kid raised by the Toad Hermit. Show me how strong you are!

column5:
まだ修行が足らんぞい！\n
出なおせ！\n
出なおせ！
column6:
You need more training!\n
Try again!

column5:
まいった、まいった\n
これだけ強ければ\n
毛の国でも修行ができるじゃろう
column6: I concede! With your current strength, you should be able to train in Keno as well.

column5:
行ってこい　小僧！！\n
ほれ　タヌキのワラジを履かせてやろう\n
これがあれば山あるきができるぞい！
column6: Go forth, young one! Here, take these Tanuki Sandals. You should be able to cross the mountain with them!

column5:
けんど山んなかにゃ\n
怪物がウヨウヨでるで\n
気いつけにゃいかんぞい
column6: There are monsters up there. Be careful.

column5:
カッパと戦ったと\n
ほほうムム・・もしや\n
お主ガマ仙人の弟子か
column6:
You fought the kappa?\n
I see... You must be the disciple of the Toad Hermit.

column5: よし一手指南してやろう
column6: Very well. I'll spar with you.

column5:
まだまだ修行が\n
足りないようだのお\n
出直してきなさい
column6: You clearly need more training. Try again.

column5:
なかなかいい手スジじゃ！\n
鹿島新当流一の太刀を\n
さずけるぞ！
column6: Not bad! You have earned the sword of the Kashima Shinto-ryu!

column5:
佐竹のヤツラは許せん\n
おまえも佐竹の者か！\n
死ね！！
column6:
I'll never forgive the Satake!\n
Hey, you! Are you with the Satake?!\n
Then die!

column5:
ウッ！ワシは火の一族のマツエイじゃ\n
城に奪われた火の紋章を取り返えせず\n
辻斬りをしてウラミをはらしておった
column6:
Urgh... I'm Matsuei of the Fire Clan.\n
I was venting my anger for losing the Fire Emblem by attacking passersby.

column5:
おヌシ、ガマ族の者らしいな\n
ガマもまた、火の一族の血を引く者\n
同じ火の一族のマツエイじゃ
column6:
Are you from the Toad clan?\n
Then the blood of the Fire Clan flows in your veins.

column5:
この紋章さえあれば\n
幻の火の術が使えるという\n
奪え！　火の紋章を奪ってくれい
column6: They say the emblem will let you use fire jutsu. You must take it!
Serves you right!

column5:
ざまあ見ろ！\n
二度と来るなよ\n
ワハハハハ・・・
column6:
Serves you right!\n
And don't come back! Bwahahaha!

column5:
ま・・・まいりました！\n
どうかカンベンしてください\n
これはほんの気持ちでござる
column6: I give up! Please forgive me! Here, take this!

column5:
[f7]<$D3>われこそは　たまも姫\n
口おしや！　よくもわれのたくらみを\n
ジャマをしてたもうたな！！
column6: [f7]<$D3>I am Tamamohime! How dare you interfere with my scheme?!

column5:
小僧！　かくごしよ！\n
ギャオーン！
column6: Prepare to die, you brat! ROAAAR!

column5:
[f7]<$D4>コーン　コンコン！\n
われはこの世にかくれ住む\n
九尾の狐なり！
column6:
[f7]<$D4>Yip yiiip!\n
I am the nine-tailed fox, secretly living in this world!

column5:
この姿　見たなー\n
生かしておかぬぞ！
column6: Now that you've seen my true form, I cannot let you live!

column5:
[f7]<$D5>うううーん　くちおしや\n
われは殺硝石となりて\n
汝のゆくてにあだなさん！
column6: [f7]<$D5>Urgh... Curse you... I shall become a Sesshouseki stone and block your way!
So you've seen it!

column5:
今こそ我ら鬼族が\n
恨みをはらす戦の時\n
武器をそろえん！！
column6: Now is the time for the Oni clan to gather our weapons and get our revenge!

column5:
その為には何をおいても軍資金\n
安達ヶ原の一つ家は\n
事をなすためのワナと知れ
column6: But war requires funds. The house in Adachigahara is a trap to acquire them!

column5:
誰だ！ここは大門教の教会となったんだ\n
みだりに入る者には\n
バールダイモン様の天罰が下るぞ！
column6: Who are you?! This is the church of the Cult of Daimon! Our God, Ba'al Daimon, will punish you for your impudence!
Eeep! You'll pay for this!

column5:
あなたは剣術を使いますね\n
夢想流居合いの術の創始者　林崎甚介！\n
一手お相手いたしましょう！
column6:
You appear to be a swordsman.\n
I am Hayashizaki Jinsuke, founder of the Musou Ryu Iaido! I wish to spar with you!

column5:
まだまだ修行がたりないようですね\n
また　来てください\n
いつでも　お相手いたしましょう
column6:
It appears you need more training.\n
Come back whenever you want.\n
I'll gladly give you a rematch.

column5:
みごとです　わたしのあみ出した\n
月崩しの技を教えましょう\n
しかしこの技を持っても弾正のネズミの
column6: Well done! I will teach you my technique, the Moon Breaker. However, I'm afraid my technique won't be enough to deal with

column5:
妖術は破れないのです・・・\n
ネズミの妖術を破る方法を\n
何とか見つけなくては・・・
column6: Danjou's rat magic. You'll have to find another way to break through his spells...

column5:
[f7]<$64>ガマがネズミに勝てるものか！\n
はははは・・・
column6: [f7]<$64>A toad will never beat a rat! Bwahahaha!

column5: [f7]<$63>よ　よ　よくもーっ・・・
column6: [f7]<$63>H-How dare you...!

column5:
[f7]<$3B>まだまだ力がたりぬなガマの者よ\n
ワシは何度でも受けてたつ\n
また来るがいい
column6: [f7]<$3B>You're not strong enough, descendant of the Toad. Come back whenever you're ready.

column5:
[f7]<$3A>見事だ！\n
ガマ族の若者よ！\n
いやさ！自来也！
column6: [f7]<$3A>A perfect display, descendant of the Toad -- No, Ziria!

column5:
人間どもが鬼と言うのは　おのが\n
邪悪な部分をうとましく思うがゆえ\n
我らを鬼と呼んで滅ぼそうとするのだ
column6: Humans call us Oni because they hate their own wicked hearts, and they wish to make us their scapegoats.

column5:
ガマの者にも我らが血が流れておる\n
人間の卑劣さになじむなよ\n
これを持って行くがよい
column6: Our blood flows in the veins of the Toad clan. Steer clear from human cowardice. Here, take this.

column5:
その鬼のはちがねが\n
おまえの身を守ってくれるだろう\n
さらばじゃ！　自来也！
column6:
May this Oni Headband protect you.\n
Farewell, Ziria!

column5:
眠りをさますのは誰ぞ\n
我は汝らがために\n
宝を守るものぞ！
column6: Who has awakened me from my slumber? I am here to guard this treasure!

column5:
氷の巻物は戦闘でも使うことができるが\n
この陸奥を無事に抜けた後も\n
必要だろう
column6: The ice scroll can also be used in battle. You may find it useful even after you leave Mutsu.

column5:
おめェツガルアメ\n
持ってるだべエ！\n
くれェー！
column6: You got some Tsugaru candy?! Gimme!
Here we go!

column5:
どうってことないな\n
それじゃあ大門教に\n
勝てないぜ
column6: That's it? You'll never beat the Cult of Daimon like this!

column5:
なかなかやるな・・・\n
大門教は手ごわいそうだぞ！\n
煙の巻だこいつをやろう！
column6: Not bad! The Cult of Daimon is strong. Here, I'll give you the smokescreen scroll!
